protein.specific_function: Probably involved in the organization of the actin cytoskeleton by acting downstream of CDC42, inducing actin filament assembly. Alters CDC42-induced cell shape changes. In activated T-cells, may play a role in CDC42-mediated F-actin accumulation at the immunological synapse. May play a role in early contractile events in phagocytosis in macrophages

reference.reference_text: Pirone DM, Fukuhara S, Gutkind JS, Burbelo PD: SPECs, small binding proteins for Cdc42. J Biol Chem. 2000 Jul 28;275(30):22650-6.
